mqtt package¶

Submodules¶

mqtt.publish module¶

module that contains publish logic.

class mqtt.publish.Publisher¶

Bases: object

Class that contains publish logic. when given a payload and route it will publish to the correct route.

on_disconnect(client, userdata, rc)¶

function to run on disconnect

on_publish(client, userdata, result)¶

function to run on successful publish

publish(payload, topic)¶

initialises client and binds functions, publish received payload to MP and disconnects.

mqtt.subscribe module¶

module that contains logic for subscribe.

class mqtt.subscribe.Subscriber¶

Bases: object

A class that contains subscriber logic.

on_connect(client, userdata, flags, rc)¶

subscribe to the topics that were initialised.

on_log(client, userdata, level, buf)¶

function to run for logging.

on_message(client, userdata, msg)¶

prints out the topic and payload, prints to console different messages depending on topic. Also handles saving pictures if topic is facial recognition.

process_message(msg)¶

this is the main receiver code. Processes the message, check if everything arrives succesfuly.

subscribe()¶

initialises mqtt client. binds on connect, message and log functions to the client. connects to the address and starts loop.
